sense.def:
To be honest about something
pomeni biti popolnoma iskren o nečem.

seg.quote: At least you're honest about why you want the money.
To be perfectly honest, up until three weeks ago I had never set foot in a nightclub.
Not all scientists are as honest as Pasteur was.

sense.def:
Kdor je
honest
, ne goljufa, ne krši zakona in mu lahko zaupamo dragocene predmete.

seg.quote: He's very honest in money matters.
If he couldn't get rare shrubs honestly, he would steal them.
It's true as I'm sitting here, Mabel, honest it is.
